title: Bali Grand Opening: Luxury Ubud Glamping with All-Day Dining & Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Be one of the first to experience Bali’s newest luxury glamping resort deep in the heart of the jungle at Kanva Ubud, by K-Club. This impressive resort boasts unparalleled, sweeping views of Bali's picturesque, lush green valleys where the infinity pool meets the premier Kabana Jungle Club - hosting internationally acclaimed DJs. Found just 25 minutes north of Ubud's centre, you can easily spend your days exploring both Bali's hotspots or more remote expanses like the Tegallalang Rice Terraces.

Find an indulgent home away from home in your private serviced glamping tent, with breathtaking views over the lush forest below, romantic private jacuzzis or pools and expansive living spaces. As the sun rises, surrender to the tranquil embrace of untouched nature and as the sun sets, dance the night away at the vibrant club. Rejuvenate at Mekar Spa, with unique farm-to-spa treatments, or stretch out your worries at the open-air yoga studio, before re-fuelling at Akar Restaurant.
offer_address: Jalan Raya Cebok, Kedisan Tegallalang, Kedisan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80561, Indonesia

title: Exotic Hideaway in the Heart of Ubud
description: Experience the exotic allure of Ubud with an escape to The Sankara Suites & Villas. Located in the heart of the jungle and just ten minutes from Ubud town, it’s a secluded hideaway with easy access to all this beautiful region in Bali has to offer. Included in your package is daily breakfast, two two-course dinners, daily afternoon tea, one cocktail per person, per day, a 60-minute massage each and more.

title: Luxe Villa Getaway with Private Pool and Unlimited Access to Bali Zoo
description: Get away from it all and treat yourself to a tranquil villa getaway in one of Ubud’s most luxurious destinations. The Sanctoo Villas & Spa offers a chic villa escape with a difference, thanks to its incredible location next to Bali Zoo. Spend your days swimming in your private pool or take advantage of unlimited access to Bali Zoo and visit bears, tigers, orangutans and more. Experience the holiday of a lifetime and enjoy daily breakfast at Sanctoo Restaurant, two decadent three-course dinners, a luxurious 45-minute massage, an Ubud Village tour, return airport transfers and so much more. And if you're planning a family getaway the Sanctoo Villas & Spa is the perfect choice - up to two kids (aged 11 years and under) stay free and enjoy free meals when dining with an adult!
offer_address: Singapadu 80752, Bali, Indonesia

vendor_name: Amarea Resort Ubud by iNi Vie Hospitality
title: Tranquil Ubud Rainforest Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Find yourself surrounded by forest greenery, feeling as tranquil as ever, with a stay at this hidden gem in the heart of Bali's creative hub: Ubud. Whether you're unwinding with a cocktail in hand, exploring the vibrant landscapes on a scenic trek or diving into the sparkling lagoon pool, every moment here is a chance to reconnect with nature.

Start each day with a calming yoga session in the open-air yoga venue, where the gentle morning breeze and soft sunlight come together to set the perfect tone for mindfulness and relaxation. For the ultimate in indulgence, treat yourself to a serene massage at Svaha Spa Teges, surrounded by soothing rainforest sounds.

From morning to night, savour Japanese bites, classic breakfast dishes and creative cocktails at Norii, a yakitori-style bar catering to all your cravings. Make the most of the resort's complimentary shuttle service into Ubud city centre and venture out of the resort to explore the island's finest dining, shopping districts and traditional temples. Nearby, you can easily access lush rice terraces, the sacred Monkey Forest, art galleries and vibrant local markets.
location_description: Amarea Resort & Spa Ubud by iNi Vie Hospitality
offer_address: Jl. Sawah Indah Gang Amarea 8, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Romantic Ubud Private Suites & Villas with Daily Breakfast, Daily Choice of Lunch or Dinner, Massages & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Retreat to jungle-fringed paradise at this five-star romantic hideaway, perfect for those seeking a serene Ubud escape. At Kaamala Resort Ubud, where traditional stone and wood carvings are complemented by modern design, and sweeping views over terraced rice paddies and breathtaking valleys leave you spellbound. Absorb the beauty of the landscape from the resort's stunning infinity pool, complete with a large hammock overlooking the edge. Tap into the spiritual with daily yoga sessions or restore, renew and rejuvenate at the tranquil Svaha Spa.

While this tranquil oasis may leave you feeling miles away from the everyday, the endless wonders of Ubud are all within close reach, including the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, Ubud Art Market and Ubud Palace. Return to Wild Air Restaurant, where signature Indonesian plates and panoramic views over treetops await.
location_description: Kaamala Luxury Resort & Spa Ubud by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: 888A Jalan Bisma, Ubud, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: French-Inspired Five-Star Ubud Jungle Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Choice of Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Reclaim your inner peace and reawaken your senses at a blissfully secluded five-star hideaway amid the verdant jungle of Ubud. Showcasing luxurious, French-inspired style and the dreamy 1,000sqm OmTara Spa by Clarins, this is the lush capital of wellbeing in Bali. Picture-perfect rice paddy fields, beautiful Sanskrit carvings and serene chants from nearby temples set the scene for a resort where dreams and reality blend seamlessly. From the peaceful pavilions to the two remarkable jungle-clad pools and myriad of walkways leading through lush foliage, this resort naturally integrates first-class facilities with pristine nature. Each day brings new adventures with a plethora of complimentary daily wellness, culture, and foodie activities on offer. 

Sink into a sunbed by the retreat pool and watch the morning rays rise through the emerald vegetation, relax around the jungle river pool, and experience the freedom of gliding high above the trees on a convivial swing. Unwind in total privacy, then embark on an epicurean journey across the resort’s five restaurants and bars, whose farm-to-table menus are lead by organic produce, or enrich yourself with an innovative treatment at the exceptional OmTara Spa by Clarins.
offer_address: Banjar Tanggayuda, Jalan Taman Sari, Kedewatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Multi-Award-Winning Five-Star Ubud Escape with Private Pool & Daily Dining
description:
Experience the exotic allure of Ubud, Bali’s spiritual hinterland, staying at the multi-award-winning Viceroy Bali. Located in the central foothills of the Gianyar regency and just five minutes from the thriving culture and arts scene of Ubud, the five-star Viceroy Bali is a perfectly secluded hideaway with easy access to all this beautiful region has to offer. Each suite and villa features a private pool, ensuring utmost exclusivity and romance.

Your escape includes daily à la carte breakfast, your choice of daily three-course lunch or dinner, one 60-minute couple's massage, a daily cocktail each and complimentary airport pick-up.
offer_address: Jl. Lanyahan, Br. Nagi, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Ubud Luxury with Guaranteed Pool Villa Upgrade, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Elevate Bali opulence to new heights in these blissfully secluded villas in Ubud, located within the luxurious Kappa Senses complex. Reclaim your inner peace and reawaken your senses with a myriad of facilities: dine across six epicurean restaurants, plunge into the winding Jungle River Pool and indulge in French-inspired style at the dreamy 1,000sqm OmTara Spa by Clarins.

Picture-perfect rice fields, beautiful Sanskrit carvings and serene chants from nearby temples set the scene for a resort where dreams and reality blend seamlessly. From the peaceful pavilions to the multitude of walkways leading through lush foliage, this resort naturally integrates first-class facilities with pristine nature. 

Each day brings new adventures with complimentary daily wellness, culture, and foodie activities.

Venture out of your private oasis to explore Ubud, dotted with vibrant cafes, historic temples and natural landscapes. Return to experience the freedom of gliding high above the trees on a jungle swing and savour farm-to-table menus led by organic produce before returning to your heavenly villa for moments of tranquillity.
offer_address: Banjar Tanggayuda, Jalan Taman Sari, Kedewatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Ubud All-Inclusive Luxury Pool Villas with Massages, Butler Service & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Hidden among Ubud's lush, jungle-covered hills, scenic rice terraces and the winding Ayung River, this five-star all-villa tropical sanctuary is one of Bali's best-kept secrets. Adorned with Balinese touches, each spacious villa has been designed to offer the perfect escape for honeymooners, dreamers and families alike - soul-stirring vistas, complimentary butler service and a luxurious private pool come standard here.

Soak up the verdant views of the rice terraces from the resort's open-air breakfast restaurant, Scene, and savour local flavours at the romantic Swept Away, nestled along the riverbank. 

Balance your body, mind and soul at the world-class The Spa at The Samaya, offering treatments from Balinese couples rituals to shiatsu. Or, if you are culinary-curious, learn how to master regional recipes from the experts in a cooking class.

When you're ready to explore, stroll through a monkey-filled forest and admire Ubud's cultural marvels, including ancient temples and art galleries, just a stone's throw from the resort.
offer_address: Banjar Baung, Desa Sayan, Ubud, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Ubud Cliffside Villas on Ayung River with Massages, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
A slice of jungle paradise awaits you at the luxurious five-star Nandini Jungle by Hanging Gardens, a serene sanctuary in the heart of the Payangan Rainforest. Here, Balinese culture and contemporary charm combine to create a deluxe destination like no other: the resort is modelled on a traditional Balinese village, with 34 villas and suites cascading down the hillside.

Start your morning peacefully by soaking in amazing jungle views, relax inside the glistening infinity swimming pool or enjoy a soothing spa experience at Sungai Spa, before finishing the day with cocktails to accompany the spectacular sunset view over the river gorge.

Framed by Bali’s iconic terraced green rice paddies, monkey-filled jungles and swaying coconut palms, Ubud offers some of the island’s most beautiful scenery, which can be discovered on rice field tours. A complimentary shuttle takes you from the resort to Ubud, the cultural heart of Bali, brimming with vibrant restaurants, yoga studios, galleries and markets.
offer_address: Br, Jl. Susut, Buahan, Payangan, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80572, Indonesia

description: Discover the lush green beauty of Ubud with its terraced rice paddies, jungle and palm trees, staying at the Best Western Premier® Agung Resort Ubud. Just a stone’s throw from Ubud’s key attractions, this premium resort offers a beautiful tropical pool, a spa and more. Your stay includes daily breakfast, your choice of lunch or dinner daily, a relaxing 60-minute massage each, a complimentary cocktail or beer per person each day and airport pickup on arrival. Plus, up to two kids aged 11 and under stay free.
location_description: Best Western Premier Agung Resort Ubud

title: Award-Winning Ubud Rainforest Hideaway with Iconic Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Find serenity among the untouched rainforests of Bali at this breathtakingly beautiful five-star resort. Located just 35 minutes from the island's celebrated arts capital, Ubud, Padma Resort Ubud offers new heights of unparalleled luxury in the heart of the Island of the Gods, with a truly iconic heated infinity pool, surrounded by the enchanting sounds and sights of the Payangan forest.

With Padma Resort Ubud's rotating schedule of complimentary resort activities - including a range of yoga classes, cycling tours, archery experiences and the exceptional Wolly Kids Club - you'll be all set to escape the everyday, learn something new and truly embrace a new level of relaxation.

When not trying the on-site activities, explore the city’s lush rice fields, check out the abundance of galleries and museums, get to know the Ubud Monkey Forest’s cheeky inhabitants or slow down and take it all in - Ubud offers boundless opportunities for travellers of all stripes.
offer_address: Banjar Carik, Desa Puhu, Payangan, Ubud, Bali 80572, Indonesia

title: Ubud Riverfront Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Escape to Ubud's lush green rice paddies and discover your private slice of island paradise at this five-star boutique retreat, home to just 23 elegantly appointed villas, each offering high-end butler service, a glistening private pool and quintessential Balinese design.

Hidden within a tropical forest overlooking the Ayung River, heavenly Kayumanis Ubud Private Villa & Spa radiates tranquillity - yet is just a 15-minute drive from Bali's vibrant cultural capital, Ubud. Indulge in a wealth of wellness treatments at Kayumanis Spa Ubud, or treat yourself to a romantic feast high over the river valley at Dining Corner.

Embrace the beauty of the Balinese jungle and the vibrancy of Ubud, home to world-class restaurants and shopping. Take a short drive and discover innumerable nearby temples or the popular Aloha Ubud Swing, a perfect spot to take in sweeping vistas of rice paddies, rainforests, lakes and waterfalls.

Visit thousands of Balinese long-tailed macaque monkeys within their home at the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, or journey an extra five minutes to Goa Gajah Elephant Cave temple.
offer_address: Jalan Kayumanis Sayan, Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Grand Opening: Secluded Ubud Jungle Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Renowned for its lush rainforests and serene bamboo-clad surroundings, Ubud is the perfect jungle setting for Cicada Luxury Resort Ubud. A place of verdant allure, the landscape is showcased through transitional indoor-outdoor design, from the open-air yoga shala and spa suites, to alfresco dining spaces. Savour the sounds of the wilderness over 15 courses at Tangelo a Contemporary Cuisine and tantalise your palate with exotic cocktails at Verdant Pool Lounge and Bar, best enjoyed to the soundtrack of nightly live music.

Cascading over the dense jungles of Tegalalang, this luxe reprieve is secluded in a world of its own, yet moments from the untouched rice terraces, sacred sights and temples of Sebatu village. Let the dedicated concierge team decide your day in Ubud's mesmerising caves and monkey forests, or stay local to sip sacred spring water said to grant youthful vitality.

title: Romantic Ubud Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Daily Choice of Lunch or Dinner
description:
Discover the lush jungles, grand temples and authentic markets of Ubud in this romantic villa hideaway. Forget about the rest of the world in your own private villa, boasting a shimmering pool, bubbling hot tub and breezy lounge area, perfectly positioned amid terraced rice fields.

When you're not enjoying a poolside cocktail or a tension-melting massage, venture out to Ubud centre - just a 15-minute trip on the complimentary shuttle service - and immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture. With various hidden waterfalls, Balinese swings and the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary all within reach, an escape to this hideaway ensures you can tick off all the Ubud's quintessential experiences.
location_description: Asvara Villa Ubud, by Ini Vie Hospitality

title: Five-Star Maya Ubud Jungle Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Indulge in five-star bliss at the breathtaking Maya Ubud Resort & Spa - a stunning Balinese sanctuary ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Cradled by the dramatic Petanu River valley and the rolling rice paddies of Peliatan, Maya Ubud Resort & Spa is a jewel within a tranquil 10-hectare tropical haven. Designed to capture the spirit of a traditional Balinese village, this ultra-luxe retreat combines local elegance and hospitality with a true five-star experience.

Plunge into the glistening infinity pool overlooking the enchanting forest (with a kids' pool for the little ones), build up a sweat on the tennis court, experience euphoria at the spa with a rejuvenating treatment beside the swirling waters of the Petanu River, or spend each morning aligning your chakras at the tranquil yoga pavilion. For a day out, it's just a leisurely 20-minute stroll to vibrant Ubud town with its artisan markets, colourful boutiques and world-class restaurants.

title: Tranquil Ubud Rainforest Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Two-Course Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Located just north of Ubud, the home of Bali’s famous rice terraces, this luxury resort and spa is truly at one with its lush natural surroundings. Lose yourself in tranquil landscaped gardens, soak in the poolside whirlpool or float away in a romantic flower bath followed by an indulgent river stone massage at l’santē AnandaDara SPA.

Nestled moments from Ubud's culinary scene, the resort's de Daara eateries offer a tantalising blend of international flavours, from crowd-pleasers like authentic nasi goreng to gourmet pizzas, with its name taken from the Balinese word 'Daar' meaning 'eat'.

While staying in Bali's most serene province, make the most of your location. Take a short drive to the nearby Ulu Petanu Waterfall, discover local art at the Ubud Market and relish in your proximity to the Tegallalang Rice Terraces - one of Bali's most photographed destinations.

description:

title: Boutique Five-Star Ubud Retreat with Japanese-Inspired Hot Tub, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Find harmony between verdant landscapes and modern comforts, the five-star Bisma Eight Ubud showcases a boutique sanctuary tucked within a raw-concrete architecture oasis that harmonises beautifully with the leafy Ubud valley. This serene haven is home to an intimate collection of just 50 luxurious villas and suites, each complete with a Japanese-style soaking tub and modern, minimalist touches sure to leave a lasting impression. Lose track of time at the Library Café, toast to your escape with cocktails at Pavilion or indulge in a delicious feast complete with rooftop views from Copper Restaurant - where much of the ingredients come from the hotel’s organic farm and conservatory. For something more intimate, Embers Restaurant serves Mediterranean classics under the stars and the Mandala Spa promises unparalleled pampering - both away from the main hotel in the private villa wing.

Make the most of your stay and venture to the nearby Ubud Royal Place - just 10 minutes on foot, the popular Ubud Monkey Forest or the iconic Tegalalang Rice Terrace, tap into the history of the region and visit Ubud Palace, or get your culture fix at the Agung Rai Museum of Art or Neka Art Museum.

description: Stay in one of just 40 luxury suites at the boutique Jungle Retreat by Kupu Kupu Barong, Bali. Nestled into the lush greenery of Ubud, this secluded property is home to the award-winning Mango Tree Spa by L’Occitane. Included in your escape is daily breakfast, one romantic dinner for two, a 90-minute massage plus 40% off further treatments at the spa, and a luxuriously late 2pm check-out.
location_description: Jungle Retreat by Kupu Kupu Barong
offer_address: Jl. Raya Kedewatan, Kedewatan, Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Ubud Resort Luxury with Butler Service & Club Perks Including Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Immerse yourself in the tranquil surroundings of the sprawling Ubud retreat, the five-star Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana. This luxurious haven is home to just twenty suites and villas, each offering extensive club benefits, and was recently named one of the Top 25 Boutique Hotels in Asia in the Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice Awards 2022, as well as one of the best resorts in the world in the Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards 2022. Hidden within 12 acres of verdant, emerald-green rice paddies, this heavenly resort radiates peace, quiet and tranquility, just ten minutes from the artists' village of Ubud.

Rediscover the meaning of relaxation with a day of pampering at the spa, take to the skies with a hot-ballooning adventure, or learn about Balinese culture with onsite cooking classes and dance performances. Later, retreat to your thoughtfully designed suite or villa to rest, recharge and repeat it all over again.

title: Ubud Five-Star Luxury Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Butler Service
description:
Escape to Ubud's lush, serene hills and discover your private slice of island paradise at the five-star boutique retreat, Kayumanis Ubud Private Villas & Spa. This luxury retreat is home to just 23 elegantly appointed villas, each offering butler service and private pools. Hidden within a tropical forest overlooking the Ayung River, this heavenly resort radiates tranquillity - yet it's just five minutes from Bali's vibrant cultural capital, Ubud.

Indulge in a wealth of wellness treatments at Kayumanis Spa Ubud, or treat yourself to a romantic feast high over the river valley at Dining Corner. Take in Ubud's beauty with a guided tour, enrich your home recipes with onsite cooking classes or learn to relax, meditate and harmonise your body through the resort's extensive yoga program.
offer_address: Jalan Kayumanis Sayan, Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Ubud Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Experience the pinnacle of paradise at Viceroy Bali, a five-star sanctuary rated among the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, and Best Luxury Resort in Asia at the World Luxury Hotel Awards 2021. Sitting on a steep ravine, overlooking the Petanu Valley, this luxury hotel is surrounded by rich Balinese jungle and is just five minutes from the centre of bustling Ubud. Here, you’ll find some of the island’s best restaurants and magnificent markets full of unique artisan gifts.

Intimate and family-run (a rarity for a five-star hotel in Bali), Viceroy Bali is home to 40 suites and villas with sweeping views of perfectly placed palm trees and luxurious amenities. Part of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World Collection, the resort was once named the Best Resort in the World in the Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards. Discover true tranquility at Lembah Spa, where treatments combine traditional Balinese techniques with modern wellness knowledge. Sample Ubud’s finest dining at Apéritif, the 1920s-inspired restaurant and bar that celebrates high-quality ingredients and global influences through a distinguished degustation menu, or opt for something a little more relaxed at Cascades Restaurant Ubud, where traditional Indonesian dishes sit beside western classics.
offer_address: Jl. Lanyahan, Br. Nagi, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

vendor_name: PURI WULANDARI A BOUTIQUE RESORT & SPA
title: Ubud Boutique Hillside Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly 3-Course Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover the lush jungles, cascading rice paddies and soaring mountains of Bali’s spiritual heartland in this Ubud retreat. Crafted in traditional Balinese style, each secluded villa features thatched roofs and traditional flourishes, without compromising on luxury touches.

In addition to your villa's own private pool, an incredible infinity pool looks out from the top of the resort over rainforests and dramatic volcanic gulfs. Two restaurants and one bar serve exquisite local fusion meals and tropical cocktails - best enjoyed while watching the sunset ignite the sky in vivid red and gold.

Suspended over the lush Ubud jungle of orchids, bamboo and coffee trees, Hanging Gardens of Bali is an exotic Eden. This incredible property was heralded 'The World's First Seven Stars Boutique Hotel' in the Seven Stars Hospitality Awards 2021. Watch the world melt away from the famed two-tiered pool, which appears to float above the mist-covered forest below. Marvel at awe-inspiring views that stretch down to the Ayung River, across the valley to the sacred Dalem Segara Temple. Discover the vibrance of Ubud Town - less than a 30-minute shuttle away - and find serenity at the riverside spa.

Romantic pathways lead to Hanging Gardens of Bali’s 44 secluded pool villas, and getting around this vertiginous property is simple: you’ll be whisked up and down the hill via the onsite funicular. Dining at the Feng Shui-inspired Three Elements Restaurant is an award-winning feast for the senses. Enjoy not only a tantalising culinary journey, but also views of the pool, valley and, after dusk, the glow of hundreds of romantic candles.

At Kaamala Resort Ubud, traditional stone and wood carvings are complemented by modern design, and sweeping views over terraced rice paddies and breathtaking valleys leave you spellbound.

Absorb the beauty of the landscape from the resort's infinity pool, complete with a large hammock overlooking the edge. Tap into the spiritual with daily yoga sessions or restore, renew and rejuvenate at the tranquil Svaha Spa.

While this tranquil oasis may leave you feeling miles away from the every day, the endless wonders of Ubud are all within close reach, including the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, Ubud Art Market and Ubud Palace. Return to Habitat Bistro, where signature Indonesian plates and panoramic views over treetops await.

With Padma Resort Ubud's rotating schedule of complimentary resort activities - including a range of yoga classes, cycling tours, archery experiences and the exceptional Wolly Kids Club - you'll be all set to soak up the region's legendary serenity.

Padma Resort Ubud, stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2023 award - and crowned Asia's #4 best hotel - is the perfect launchpad to explore Ubud, Bali’s trendy and effortlessly inventive artistic wonderland. Visit the city’s lush rice fields, check out the abundance of galleries and museums, get to know the Ubud Monkey Forest’s cheeky inhabitants or slow down and take it all in - Ubud offers boundless opportunities for travellers of all stripes.

description:
Experience the pinnacle of paradise at Viceroy Bali, a five-star sanctuary rated among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Sitting on a steep ravine, overlooking the Petanu Valley, this luxury hotel is surrounded by rich Balinese jungle but is just ten minutes from the centre of bustling Ubud. Here, you’ll find some of the island’s best restaurants, magnificent markets and independent boutiques, full of unique artisan gifts.

Intimate and family-run (a true rarity for a five-star hotel in Bali), Viceroy Bali is home to 40 suites and villas, with sweeping views of perfectly placed palm trees, private pools and luxurious amenities. Part of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World Collection, the resort was once named the Best Resort in the World in the Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards. While leaving your sumptuous sanctuary is optional, there’s more to explore. Discover true tranquility at Lembah Spa, where treatments combine traditional Balinese techniques with modern wellness knowledge. Sample Ubud’s finest dining at Apéritif, the 1920s-inspired restaurant and bar that celebrates high-quality ingredients and global influences through a distinguished degustation menu, or opt for something a little more relaxed at Cascades Restaurant Ubud, where traditional Indonesian dishes sit beside western classics.

- Wake up in rainforest paradise with delicious daily à la carte breakfast at Cascades Restaurant Ubud
- Enjoy a daily cocktail or mocktail per person at either Apéritif or Cascades Restaurant Ubud - the perfect sundowner
- Unwind with a 60-minute couple's massage at Lembah Spa, a magnificent retreat overlooking the Petanu River gorge
- Celebrate with a special one-time three-course gourmet dinner served at Cascades Restaurant Ubud
- A convenient one-way transfer from Bali Airport to whisk you away to this calm oasis

**Longer-Stay Bonus Inclusions:** Extend your stay to five nights and enjoy an eight-course degustation dining experience at Apéritif once during your stay. Seven-night stays can look forward to two three-course dinners at Cascades Restaurant Ubud and two 60-minute couple's massages at Lembah Spa. See individual packages for details.

**Villa Upgrade:** Looking for added luxury? Upgrade to a beautiful Terrace Villa or Deluxe Terrace Villa to enjoy your own infinity-edge pool and traditional thatched Balinese pavilion. 

**Deluxe Terrace Villa Bonus Inclusion:** choose this heavenly villa, boasting contemporary style and a larger infinity pool, to enjoy nightly three-course dinners at Cascades Restaurant Ubud.

description:
Uncover absolute serenity among the lush jungles and cascading rice paddies of Ubud, Bali’s spiritual hinterland, at the five-star Puri Wulandari A Boutique Resort & Spa. Crafted in traditional Balinese style, villas have thatched roofs, local wood finishes and volcanic rock walls blending seamlessly with the jungle surrounds, without compromising on luxurious modern touches to make your stay ultra-comfortable.

An incredible infinity pool looks out over the verdant landscape, where you won’t spot another soul for miles. Two restaurants and one bar serve up exquisite local and fusion meals and tasty cocktails (best enjoyed while watching the sunset). When you’re ready to pamper yourself, head to the open-air Lila Ulangun Spa for a Balinese massage, a soak in the jacuzzi or a steam in the sauna. Known as the spiritual capital of Bali, Ubud is home to some of the island’s most famous natural landscapes, lush rainforests, terraced rice paddies, Hindu temples and shrines. A peaceful retreat away from the hustle and bustle of the city, Ubud calls for slowing down the pace, reconnecting with nature and checking out from your daily life.

vendor_name: Royal Kamuela Villas & Suites - Monkey Forest Ubud
title: Serene Ubud Adults-Only Suite & Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner, Massages & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Romantic moments await at Royal Kamuela Villas & Suites at Monkey Forest, Ubud, a five-star, adults-only oasis in the heart of Bali’s inimitable spiritual hinterland. Spend your day exploring sloping rice terraces, waterfall-kissed Hindu temples and the region’s legendary Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary - just a five-minute walk away - before returning to your villa and the resort’s magnificent central pool. With a daily hour of delicious free-flow cocktails included, you and your special someone can sip away while watching the sunset melt beneath the banyan trees.

When it comes to iconic Bali experiences, Royal Kamuela Villas & Suites at Monkey Forest, Ubud more than delivers - enjoy poolside coffees, afternoon tea and dinners of aromatic nasi goreng and richly glazed barbecue chicken at the acclaimed Shrida Taste of Ubud, then head to Aum Spa for massage treatments backed by millennia of Balinese tradition.

vendor_name: Gdas Bali Health and Wellness Resort
title: Grand Opening: Ubud Boutique Wellness Sanctuary with Massages & Daily Dining
description:
You are invited to be one of the very first to experience the swaying rice fields and serene yoga shala of the brand-new Gdas Bali Health and Wellness Resort - a blissful boutique sanctuary in Ubud, Bali’s spiritual and cultural heart. Connected to the new holistic wellness centre The Bali Eden, this peaceful resort has spared no expense in providing guests with the ultimate in rejuvenating luxury. Its meticulous VIP concierge offers bespoke, personalised service designed to elevate every extraordinary experience. Practise hot yoga, dine on locally sourced vegan plates at Tangi, embark on handcrafted wellness journeys at Arana Spa or sip ice-cold Loloh by the resort’s mirage-like pool.

Feel renewed with warm hospitality, flawless service, wholesome food and wellness methods backed by countless years of Balinese wisdom. When you’re ready to explore, Ubud provides countless treasures for soulful seekers and art aficionados alike, across an abundance of ancient temples, fascinating museums and heron-filled forests.

title: Five-Star Ubud Rainforest Hideaway with World-Famous Pool, Daily Breakfast & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Find serenity among the untouched rainforests of Bali at the breathtakingly beautiful, five-star Padma Resort Ubud. Located just 35 minutes from Bali’s celebrated arts capital, Ubud, the resort offers unparalleled luxury, including an instantly Instagrammable heated infinity pool, luxurious wellness spa, kids' club, fitness centre, sauna, steam room, three onsite eateries and the prestigious Padma Club Lounge, all surrounded by the enchanting sounds and sights of the Payangan forest.

Padma Resort Ubud, stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2022 award and currently ranked as the #1 hotel in Panyangan, is the perfect launchpad to explore Ubud, Bali’s trendy and effortlessly inventive artistic wonderland. Visit the city’s lush rice fields, check out the abundance of galleries and museums, get to know the Ubud Monkey Forest’s cheeky inhabitants or slow down and take it all in - Ubud offers boundless opportunities for travellers of all stripes.

description:
Sink into the tranquillity of Bali's lush landscapes with a serene stay at this newly opened, five-star glamping villa. Perfectly positioned amid the rice terraces, each villa takes glamping to a new level of luxury with all the comforts of home - as well as the chance to luxuriate by your sparkling private pool.

Drift into pure Balinese bliss with a massage at the Soleil Spa, or venture out with a private car to Ubud centre and explore the famed Ubud Art Market or Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary. As the sun sets, raise a glass and toast to the enchanting life with a nightly cocktail on the Lacoo Restaurant rooftop.
offer_address: Jalan Arjuna, Banjar Abianseka, Mas, Ubud, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Northern Ubud Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner, Cocktails & Massages
description:
Enjoy some well-earned rest and indulge in peaceful tranquillity deep in the heart of the jungle with a relaxing Ubud stay. This impressive resort boasts unparalleled, sweeping views of Bali's picturesque, lush green valleys accompanied by the finest traditional Balinese touches.

Found just 25 minutes from the centre of Ubud, spend your days exploring one of Bali's hotspots or visit the Tegalalang Rice Terraces. Closer to home, embrace the air of romance found across the resort and take a dip in the cascading infinity pool perched over the jungle.

Where breathtaking beauty and serenity meet, this resort is the perfect destination if relaxation is at the front of your mind. Indulge in a soothing massage or a spa treatment at Svaha Spa. Then, finish each day on a high note with a delicious cocktail and authentic Indonesian dining experience at Ankhusa.
location_description: Aksari Luxury Resort & Spa Ubud by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: 88 Jalan Raya Desa Kenderan, Kenderan, Ubud, Bali 80561, Indonesia

title: Ubud Five-Star Private Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Escape to Ubud's lush green rice paddies and discover your private slice of island paradise at the five-star boutique retreat, Kayumanis Ubud Private Villa & Spa. This luxury retreat is home to just 23 elegantly appointed villas, each offering butler service and private pools. Hidden within a tropical forest overlooking the Ayung River, this heavenly resort radiates tranquillity - yet is just five minutes from Bali's vibrant cultural capital, Ubud. Indulge in a wealth of wellness treatments or treat yourself to a romantic feast high over the river valley at Dining Corner. Take in Ubud's beauty with a guided tour, enrich your home recipes with onsite cooking classes or learn to relax, meditate and harmonise your body through the resort's extensive yoga program.

Embrace the beauty of the Balinese jungle and vibrancy of Ubud, home to world-class restaurants and shops. Take a short drive and discover a plethora of nearby temples and the popular Aloha Ubud Swing, the perfect spot to take in sweeping vistas of rice paddies, lush rainforests, lakes and waterfalls. Visit thousands of Balinese long-tailed macaque monkeys at the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, or journey an extra five minutes to Goa Gajah Elephant Cave temple.
offer_address: Jalan Kayumanis Sayan, Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Multi-Award-Winning Balinese Luxury in Ubud

title: Tranquil Ubud Rainforest Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Find yourself surrounded by forest greenery, feeling as tranquil as ever, with a stay at this hidden gem in the heart of Bali’s creative hub: Ubud. Whether you’re unwinding with a cocktail in hand, exploring the vibrant landscapes on a scenic trek or diving into the sparkling lagoon pool, every moment here is a chance to reconnect with nature.

Start each day with a calming yoga session in the open-air yoga venue, where the gentle morning breeze and soft sunlight come together to set the perfect tone for mindfulness and relaxation. For the ultimate in indulgence, treat yourself to a serene massage at Svaha Spa Teges, surrounded by soothing rainforest sounds.

From morning to night, savour Japanese bites, classic breakfast dishes and creative cocktails at Norii, a yakitori-style bar catering to all your cravings. Make the most of the resort’s complimentary shuttle service into Ubud city centre and venture out of the resort to explore the island’s finest dining, shopping districts and traditional temples. Nearby, you can easily access lush rice terraces, the sacred Monkey Forest, art galleries and vibrant local markets.

When you're not enjoying a poolside cocktail or a tension-melting massage, venture out to Ubud centre - just a 15-minute trip on the complimentary shuttle service - and immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture. With various hidden waterfalls, Balinese swings and the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary all within reach, an escape to Asvara Ubud Villas ensures you can tick off all the town's quintessential experiences.

description:
Surrounded by verdant rice paddies, this luxurious five-star retreat in Ubud seamlessly blends natural beauty with opulence. Visesa Ubud Resort offers a serene retreat while remaining just 10 minutes from Bali's vibrant cultural hub. With three complimentary daily shuttles to Ubud's center, guests can easily explore the area's rich offerings.

description:
Escape to the undulating hills of Ubud in search of serenity and rejuvenation at the five-star Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana, an urban sanctuary ranked among Tripadvisor’s top 1% of properties worldwide. This luxury retreat is home to just twenty suites and villas, each featuring unique artwork, traditional elegance and modern-day comforts in natural Balinese surrounds. Unwind with a day of pampering at the spa, indulge in a romantic feast amidst the rice paddies, or learn about Balinese culture with onsite cooking classes and dance performances. Take in Ubud's beauty with a guided tour of the surrounding landscapes, or witness it from above with Bali’s first hot-ballooning adventure. At the end of the day, retreat to your thoughtfully designed suite or villa to rest, recharge and repeat it all over again.

title: Five-Star Ubud Rainforest Retreat on Ayung River with Daily Breakfast & Sunset Cocktails
description:
A slice of jungle paradise awaits you at the luxurious five-star Nandini Jungle Resort & Spa, a serene sanctuary in the heart of the gorgeous Payangan Rainforest. Balinese culture and contemporary charm combine to create a deluxe destination getaway like no other, with 18 opulent villas modelled after a traditional Balinese village. Start your morning peacefully with a spiritual yoga class before exploring the trendy town of Ubud, finishing with a handcrafted cocktail to accompany the spectacular sunset view over the river gorge and beyond. Or spend your days lounging by the hillside infinity swimming pool, with views out over the lush rainforest.

Framed by Bali’s iconic terraced green rice paddies, monkey-filled jungles and swaying coconut palms, Ubud offers some of the island’s most beautiful scenery, which can be discovered on rice field tours. With a complimentary shuttle from the resort to Ubud, it will take just over 20 minutes to reach the cultural heart of Bali, brimming with vibrant restaurants, yoga studios, galleries, and markets. After a long day of exploring, achieve the ultimate relaxation with soothing massages at the Sungai Spa, located right near the Ayung River.

An ideal getaway for honeymooners, Suara Alam Ubud seamlessly balances natural surroundings with contemporary comforts. Just a short drive from Ubud's vibrant craft stalls, sacred historical sites and streets vibrating with gamelan music, this retreat ensures a traditional Balinese experience.

description:
Be enchanted by beautiful Ubud, Bali’s cultural heartland, at the five-star FuramaXclusive Resort & Villas Ubud. A winner in the Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice Awards 2021, this serene resort sits beneath the majestic Mount Batur, framed by palm-fringed rice paddy fields and lush jungle.

Enjoy barefoot luxury in your private pool villa, indulge in delicious cuisine overlooking the rice fields at Padi Restaurant, sunbathe beside the resort pool or perhaps treat yourself to a spa treatment… this is the Ubud escape you’ve been waiting for.

title: Ubud Rainforest Hideaway with Massages by Clarins, Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Reclaim your inner peace and reawaken the senses at this blissfully secluded hideaway amid the verdant jungle of Ubud. Showcasing luxurious, French-inspired style and the palatial OmTara Spa by Clarins - complete with vitality pools, steam, sauna and Vichy showers - this is the lush capital of well-being in Bali.

Picture-perfect rice paddy fields, beautiful Sanskrit carvings and serene chants from nearby temples set the scene for a resort plucked from a dream. With five heavenly restaurants and bars, there’s a sanctuary to satisfy every craving, including Kokokan Restaurant’s innovative fine dining, featuring fresh produce from the resort’s onsite organic garden.

From peaceful pavilions to the two remarkable jungle-clad pools and myriad walkways leading through lush foliage, this resort naturally integrates first-class facilities with pristine nature. Each day brings new adventures and a plethora of complimentary daily wellness, culture, and foodie activities.
offer_address: Banjar Tanggayuda, Jalan Taman Sari, Kedewatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Ubud Hanging Gardens Award-Winning Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Daily Handcrafted Signature Cocktail
description:
Suspended over the lush jungle, bursting with orchids, bamboo and coffee trees, Hanging Gardens of Bali is an exotic Eden near Ubud. This incredible property was recently named by Seven Stars Luxury Hospitality Awards as the world's best boutique hotel in 2021. Watch the world melt away from the famed two-tier pool, which appears to float above the mist-covered forest below. Marvel at awe-inspiring views that stretch down to the Ayung River, across the valley to the sacred Dalem Segara Temple. Discover the vibrance of Ubud Town - less than a 30-minute shuttle away - and find serenity at the riverside spa.

Romantic pathways lead to Hanging Gardens of Bali’s 44 secluded pool villas, and getting around this vertiginous property is simple: you’ll be whisked up and down the hill via the onsite funicular. Dining at the Feng Shui-inspired Three Elements Restaurant is an award-winning feast for the senses. Enjoy not only a tantalising culinary journey, but also views of the pool, valley and, after dusk, the glow of hundreds of romantic candles.
offer_address: Buahan, Payangan, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Ubud Pool Villa Oasis near Heritage-Listed Rice Terraces with Jungle Views
description:
Run away to the misty hills of Ubud and relax like never before in your private villa among the verdant jungle. Spend your days exploring the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Tegallalang Rice Terraces, savour bold Balinese flavours at the bustling Ubud Market or find inner peace at the sacred Tirta Empul Temple.

With two- and three-bedroom villa variations to choose from, the whole family can enjoy quality time at Khastana Hadi Resort Ubud. Luxuriate in your private pool amid stunning jungle surroudnings, or rejuvenate your senses with indulgent in-villa massages. description: Escape to a five-star oasis perched above the Ayung River at Nandini Jungle by Hanging Gardens, a serene destination located in the heart of the Payangan Rainforest. After busy days exploring the bustling vibrance of Ubud or traversing through the concealed jungle paths, retreat to this intimate haven to enjoy a luxurious massage, practice yoga or simply relax around the outdoor swimming pool. As the sun sets, head to Wild Ginger Restaurant to enjoy the traditional culinary delights on offer.

title: Five-Star Award-Winning Ubud Jungle Wellness Sanctuary on the Ayung River
description: Let the rest of the world melt away when you succumb to bliss at COMO Shambhala Estate, an award-winning wellness sanctuary resting on the banks of the Ayung River, just outside of Ubud. At its heart, the resort is dedicated to achieving balance through holistic means. World-class facilities include nine treatment rooms and three treatment pavilions, each with verdant jungle panoramas, plus an outdoor vitality pool for hydrotherapy and a top-of-the-range yoga pavilion. To complement your well-being journey, indulge in nutritious and seasonal dishes at Glow, where you can watch your food being prepared in the open kitchen. Meanwhile, Indonesia's complex flavours and spices await at Kudus House, housed within a 150-year-old former Javanese residence.
offer_address: Banjar Begawan, Desa, Melinggih Kelod, Kec. Payangan, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Multi-Award-Winning Five-Star Ubud Sanctuary Perched Above Petanu River Gorge
description:
Discover a New Type of Tropical Paradise at Viceroy Bali. Viceroy Bali is a five-star sanctuary nestled in a steep ravine overlooking the tranquil Petanu Valley, part of the exclusive Small Luxury Hotels of the World (SLH) Finest Collections. Sitting on a steep ravine, overlooking the Petanu Valley, this luxury hotel is surrounded by rich Balinese jungle but is just five minutes from the centre of bustling Ubud. Here, you’ll find some of the island’s best restaurants, magnificent markets and independent boutiques, full of unique artisan gifts.

Intimate and family-run (a true rarity for a five-star hotel in Bali), Viceroy Bali is home to 40 suites and villas, each with thatched roofs, sweeping views of perfectly placed palm trees, private pools and luxurious amenities. The list of awards is lengthy and includes accolades from the Small Luxury Hotels of the World Awards and Galatian Signature Hotels Awards for 2020 alone. While leaving your sumptuous sanctuary is optional, there’s more to explore. Discover true tranquility at Akoya Spa, where treatments combine traditional Balinese techniques with modern wellness knowledge. 

Delight in the finest dining at Apéritif Restaurant, an elegant 1920s-inspired venue serving a distinguished degustation menu that celebrates high-quality ingredients and offering a borderless food experience that transcends traditional culinary boundaries. For a more laid-back experience, CasCades Restaurant presents a delicious selection of traditional Indonesian dishes alongside Western classics, all set in a stunning environment. For those seeking a sophisticated yet relaxed atmosphere, Pinstripe Bar offers expertly crafted cocktails, fine spirits, and an ambiance that perfectly complements the vibrant energy of Ubud.
offer_address: Jl. Lanyahan, Br. Nagi, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Serene Five-Star Ubud Retreat
description:
Indulge in the ultimate feeling of five-star bliss at the breathtaking Maya Ubud Resort & Spa - a stunning Balinese sanctuary that offers guests complete serenity. Cradled by the dramatic Petanu River valley and the rolling rice paddies of Peliatan, Maya Ubud is a jewel within a tranquil 10-hectare tropical haven. From here, it's a leisurely 25-minute stroll to vibrant Ubud town, bursting with artisan markets, colourful boutiques and world-class restaurants.

Designed to capture the spirit of a traditional Balinese village, this ultra-luxe retreat combines local elegance and hospitality with a true five-star experience. Reconnect with nature and plunge into the glistening infinity pool overlooking the enchanting forest, experience euphoria at Maya Spa with a rejuvenating treatment beside the swirling waters of Petanu River, or spend each morning aligning your chakras at the tranquil Bale Raga Yoga Studio. Live the good life in a carefully designed suite or villa, beautiful spaces bathed in natural light and boasting verdant vistas across the lush surrounds.
offer_address: Jalan Gunung Sari, Banjar Ambengan, Desa Peliatan, Ubud, Kec. Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia Gianyar 80571 Indonesia

title: Unique Capella Ubud Luxury Tents in the Lush Rainforest with Private Pools
description:
Where natural wonder meets boutique luxury completely surrounded by the beauty of Ubud's rainforest, Capella Ubud, Bali is the serene sanctuary crowned 'Best Upcountry Hotel' in Travel + Leisure's Luxury Awards Asia Pacific 2023. This exclusive retreat spans a collection of heritage-inspired tents and one lodge, all with private pools, that weave together to form an opulent camp rich with decor inspired by Bali's past. Savor culinary delights at Mads Lange, as you join in paying homage to the famed Danish spice trader, and Api Jiwa, where bold flavours inspired by Asian omakase dance on your palate. Toast with craft cocktails at The Mortar and Pestle Bar while munching on light snacks and listening to the sweet sounds of the forest.

Relax in the Officer's Tent, exclusively for camp residents, or gather around the campfire for storytelling evenings under the twinkling sky. Stay active throughout your stay at The Armory, the camp's tented gymnasium, offering state-of-the-art equipment and guided wellness activities from yoga to village biking. The site’s 120sqm outdoor rainforest pool invites you to swim amidst nature's beauty and Capella’s day spa, Auriga Wellness, takes you on a journey of pampering and spiritual healing.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Dalem, Banjar Triwangsa Desa Keliki, Kecamatan Tegallalang, 80561 Ubud, Bali, Indonesia

title: Romantic Ubud Jungle Paradise with Infinity Pool
description: Discover a new level of romantic luxury at Aksari Resort Ubud, a contemporary collection of suites and villas nestled in the lush valleys of Bali's Ubud. Take a dip in the cascading infinity pool perched over the jungle, recharge your body and mind with a decadent massage or spa treatment at Svaha Spa and dive into authentic Indonesian cuisine at Ankhusa or Japanese delicacies at Kojin Teppanyaki Restaurant.
location_description: Aksari Luxury Resort & Spa Ubud by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: 88 Jalan Raya Desa Kenderan, Kenderan, Ubud, Bali 80561, Indonesia

title: Ubud Five-Star Jungle Haven with Italian-Inspired Dining
description: Allow the artful spirit of Ubud to take hold when you stay at the five-star COMO Uma Ubud, a jungle sanctuary enveloped by coconut palms and banyan trees on the cusp of the Tjampuhan Valley. The outdoor terrace is the perfect place to catch balmy breezes and at the celebrated Uma Cucina, an Italian-inspired restaurant and lounge bar serving antipasto platters or ribbons of silky pasta alongside innovative cocktails from a menu curated by Lewis Wilkinson, a leading London mixologist. Slip into total bliss at the top-rated wellness centre, a tranquil haven with decadent spa treatments including a soothing Indonesian massage, plus a yoga pavilion and a 25-metre swimming pool.
offer_address: Jalan Raya Sanggingan, Banjar Lungsiakan, Kedawatan, Ubud, Gianyar 80571, Bali, Indonesia

title: Idyllic Five-Star Villa Sanctuary in the Heart of Ubud with Private Pools & Onsite Spa
description: A collection of impeccably designed villas set deep in the heart of Ubud’s lush rainforest and verdant rice paddies, five-star Bali relaxation awaits at The Samanya Ubud Bali. Feel at peace as you arrive on the tranquil grounds and make your way to your private, incredibly spacious villa. Relieve any lingering tension with a rejuvenating trip to the resort’s spa, and leave the gastronomy and mixology to the professionals with a feast at either Swept Away or Scene restaurant.
offer_address: Jalan Banjar Baung, Desa Sayan, Ubud, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Serene Five-Star Ubud Sanctuary near Bali Zoo
description:
Indulge in five-star jungle bliss at Sanctoo Suites & Villas, a secluded and serene sanctuary nestled in the heart of Ubud. Sitting in the town of Singapadu, just 30 minutes from the centre of Ubud, this peaceful patch is inspired by its proximity to the award-winning and internationally accredited Bali Zoo, with a prime position overlooking the Savannah exhibit, home to exotic African wildlife. A complimentary shuttle to the town centre puts you in the middle of the cultural action, with world-class restaurants, beautiful boutiques and great galleries all within easy reach.

Revive your senses at Sanctoo Spa, where trained therapists offer body scrubs and signature massages, or spend hours soaking up the sunshine by the savannah-inspired pool. Explore the surrounding rice paddies with a local guide or take on a two-wheel journey, mountain-biking through local villages for a taste of traditional life. Say hello to the orangutans at Kampung Sumatra, or get up close and personal with a raft of local and international animals that call Bali Zoo home. At the end of the day, rely on Sanctoo Restaurant for sensational sustenance - the menu celebrates local and international flavours, with traditional Balinese dishes enjoyed alongside Western classics.
offer_address: Raya 80582, Indonesia, Jl. Ulun Suwi 2, Singapadu, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Five-Star Ubud Retreat near Bali Zoo
description: Indulge in five-star jungle bliss at Sanctoo Suites & Villas, a serene sanctuary tucked away in the region of Gianyar, adjacent to Bali Zoo and around 20 minutes from Ubud's centre. This peaceful patch is inspired by its locale, with a lagoon pool that mimics the natural water holes of the African savannah and tranquil vistas over Wos River. Revive your senses at Sanctoo Spa with a hot stone massage or organic facial, or visit Sanctoo Restaurant for wholesome Balinese dishes.
offer_address: Jalan Ulun Suwi II, Singapadu, Kec. Sukawati, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80582, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Alila Ubud Jungle Hideaway with World-Famous Infinity Pool
description: Discover the epitome of jungle bliss with a five-star escape to Alila Ubud, nestled high above the Ayung River Valley, sprawled across the hillside among world-famous rice paddies. This serene jungle hideaway offers the utmost in luxury and seclusion, only around 15 minutes from Ubud's centre. Savour authentic farm-to-table Balinese cuisine and Western classics at Plantation Restaurant, enjoy age-old beauty treatments at Spa Alila or opt to simply relax by the world-famous infinity pool - recognised by Vogue Australia as one of the most beautiful in Bali.
offer_address: Desa Melinggih Kelod, Payangan, Gianyar, Bali 80572, Indonesia

title: Boutique Ubud Eco-Luxury Jungle Retreat with Natural Pools & Rejuvenating Spa
description:
Immerse yourself in the tranquillity of a Balinese jungle and be in harmony with nature at this luxurious sustainable stay, cradled in the heart of Ubud and perched by a babbling river. Rejuvenate amid the rich forest foliage, breathe in the crisp air, take a refreshing dip in the spring-fed natural pools and pamper yourself with authentic Balinese treatments in the stunning massage pods.

Boasting uniquely curated organic bamboo houses, choose to stay high up in the treetops or by the river and indulge in unparalleled luxury. Tuck into farm-to-table delights and Balinese delicacies at the picturesque The Riverside Warung, and sip on fruity cocktails at The Elevator Sunset Bar. If you wish to explore, there are plenty of hiking trails and walking tours to embark on nearby, while Ubud's cultural icons are only moments away.
offer_address: Jl. Baung, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Romantic Ubud Suite Escape with Infinity Pool
description: Retreat to the ultimate jungle-fringed paradise at Kaamala Resort Ubud, a romantic haven perfect for those seeking a serene escape. Absorb the beauty of the terraced rice paddies and breathtaking valleys from the resort's stunning infinity pool, complete with an oversized hammock swaying at its edge. Tap into your spiritual side with daily yoga sessions or be pampered at Svaha Spa. Later, be sure to refuel at Habitat Bistro, where signature local and international dishes await.
location_description: Kaamala Luxury Resort & Spa Ubud by Ini Vie Hospitality
offer_address: 888A Jalan Bisma, Ubud, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Bali Retreat just 10 Minutes from Ubud with Rooftop Bar
description: Discover romance among rivers and rice fields with a five-star stay at Tanadewa Resort and Spa - Ubud by Cross Collection, just 10 minutes from Bali’s soulful centre. Wake each morning to spectacular panoramic views of the lush jungle and savour days enriched by the resort’s effortless serenity. Sip cocktails high above Ubud at the stylish Sky Terrace, head to Tanaspa for traditional treatments surrounded by verdant green or watch the river drift lazily by from the resort’s infinity pool.
location_description: Tanadewa Resort and Spa - Ubud by Cross Collection
offer_address: Jl. Padang Getas, Banjar Kengetan, Desa Singakerta, Ubud, Gianyar 80571 Indonesia

title: Ubud Adults-Only Serene Escape with Rice Field Views & Spa
description:
This adults-only sanctuary, tucked away amongst Ubud's lush rice fields, offers a serene escape surrounded by idyllic greenery and breathtaking views of the majestic Mount Agung. Whether it's waking to a gentle sunrise over the rice fields from your bamboo villa, relaxing by the tranquil lagoon-style pool, or rejuvenating your body at Lasati Spa, Beehouse Dijiwa Ubud invites guests to unwind in a setting that celebrates Bali’s rich culture and natural beauty.

Designed like bee houses with structures made of wood and bamboo, this haven of tranquillity pays homage to traditional Balinese craftsmanship. When you're not soaking up pure bliss in your villa, embark on a cycling tour through Peliatan Village or enjoy a guided tour through the rice paddies. This is a place to rediscover simplicity, find inner peace and connect with the soul of Bali.
offer_address: Jl. Sawah Indah, Peliatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Elegant Beachfront Resort near Ubud with Daily Breakfast
description:
Transport yourself to a state of pure bliss with a stay at the beachfront Rumah Luwih, Bali - a five-star waterfront hideaway just a short distance from Sanur and Ubud. Styled after a classic colonial Indonesian mansion, Rumah Luwih offers pure elegance in the tranquil province of Gianyar, renowned for its outstanding food and popular night market.

Sweeping views across verdant rice paddies, lush gardens and waves crashing on the shore offer a visual delight from the moment you reach the resort. The stylish rooms promise exceptional comfort and charm, and help make this stunning spot feel like a luxurious home-away-from-home. Fill your days with adventures, eco-tourism attractions and trips to world-renowned surfing and diving spots nearby - or simply lounge by the pool overlooking the ocean, soothe your senses with an indulgent treatment at the spa and sample artisan Indonesian specialities at the onsite restaurant.
offer_address: Jl. Prof Ida Bagus Mantra Km. 19,9, Lebih, Kec. Gianyar, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali, Indonesia

title: Ubud Hillside Hideaway Overlooking Ayung River Valley with Wellness Program, Spa & Pool
description:
High above the Ayung River, stay at a secluded hillside sanctuary that blends Balinese charm with natural beauty. Hidden within Bali’s central foothills, a lush path of coconut and banana trees welcomes you to this tranquil retreat. From its elevated vantage, the resort offers views of the emerald jungle canopy and alang-alang plantations that stretch endlessly into the horizon.

Within this architectural masterpiece, designed to resemble a Balinese village, savour authentic Balinese cuisine at onsite Plantation Restaurant, or rejuvenate your senses at Spa Alila. Just five kilometres from Ubud’s artistic heart, you're invited relax, rejuvenate, and connect with the enchanting spirit of Bali’s verdant landscapes.
offer_address: Melinggih Kelod, Ubud, Gianyar, Bali 80572, Indonesia

title: French-Inspired Five-Star Ubud Jungle Luxury with Private Pool Villas & Rice Paddy Views
description: Reclaim your inner peace and reawaken your senses at Kappa Senses Ubud, a blissfully secluded hideaway amid the verdant jungle of Ubud. Showcasing luxurious, French-inspired style, five relaxing restaurants and bars and a dreamy 1,000sqm OmTara Spa by Clarins, this is the lush capital of wellbeing in Bali. Picture-perfect rice paddy fields, beautiful Sanskrit carvings and serene chants from nearby temples set the scene for a resort where dreams and reality blend seamlessly.
offer_address: Banjar Tanggayuda, Jalan Taman Sari, Kedewatan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

vendor_name: Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana
title: Award-Winning Ubud Club Suites with Butler Service & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Escape to the undulating hills of Ubud to find sumptuous serenity at the exclusive Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana (formerly The Chedi Club). Sitting among 12 acres of verdant rice paddies, this exclusive estate guarantees peace and quiet but is just 3km from the artists’ village of Ubud, where remarkable restaurants and galleries await. This unbelievable resort is rated in the top 1% worldwide on Tripadvisor and was named among the Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020 Top 25 Boutique Luxury Hotels in the world.

As the former estate of Hendra Hadiprana, one of Indonesia’s most respected art collectors, the resort places tranquility at its forefront, with lotus ponds and reflection pools scattered amid the 20 villas and suites. Rediscover the true meaning of relaxation with a day of pampering at the spa, or take to the skies with Bali’s first hot-ballooning adventure. Dine among the rice paddies or learn about Balinese culture with onsite cooking classes, dramatic Kecak dance performances and tours of the surrounding landscapes. Unwind in a sumptuous suite or pool villa with club access and let your private butler look after your every need, from babysitting to poolside pampering.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Wake up to à la carte **breakfast every morning**
- From poolside pampering to unpacking, your **private butler** will look after your every need
- Get into the holiday spirit with **free-flow sunset cocktails served daily** between 6pm and 7pm
- Experience relaxation with **a 60-minute massage per person**
- Never go thirsty with a **fresh minibar every day**, updated with beer, juices and soft drinks
- Sample an afternoon pick-me-up with **daily afternoon tea** in your room, or in the resort’s bar or lounge
- Catch up on the news with a **daily newspaper** delivered to your door, alongside **seasonal fresh fruits**
- Sample a **delicious three-course lunch or dinner** **for two** at The Tempayan (for stays of 2+ nights)
- Travel to Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana in style with a **one-way airport transfer** (for stay of 3+ nights)
- It’s the impossible choice: **an additional 60-minute massage each or three-course dinner for two** at the resort’s thatched-roof restaurant (for stays of 5+ nights)
- Arrive and depart relaxed with **return airport transfers** (for stays of 7+ nights)

**Travelling with friends or family?** For a little extra space, upgrade to the Two Bedroom Club Family Pool Villa, where a tropical garden, private pool and outdoor bathtub await. Packages valid for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under). For four adults, check out the incredible Hadiprana Estate, once the master accommodation for the resort’s founder. Soak your day away in the outdoor jacuzzi or find a special spot around the 10m private pool.

**Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top 25 Boutique Luxury Hotels - World
location_description: Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana.
offer_address: Tengkulak Kaja, Jl. Raya Goa Gajah, Kemenuh, Ubud, Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: K Club- LPC & LE+- OCT24
description: x
offer_address: Jalan Raya Cebok, Kedisan Tegallalang, Kedisan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80561, Indonesia

title: Secluded Jungle Pool Villas near Ubud
description:
Suspended over the lush jungle, bursting with orchids, bamboo, and coffee trees, Hanging Gardens of Bali is an exotic Eden near Ubud. Watch the world melt away from the famed two-tier pool, which appears to float above the mist-covered forest below. Marvel at awe-inspiring views that stretch down to the Ayung River, across the valley to the sacred Dalem Segara Temple, discover the vibrance of Ubud Town - less than a 30-minute shuttle away - and find serenity in the riverside spa by The Spa Collection.

Romantic pathways lead to Hanging Gardens of Bali’s 44 secluded pool villas, and getting around this vertiginous property is simple: you’ll be whisked up and down the hill via the onsite monorail. Dining at the Feng Shui-inspired Three Elements Restaurant is an award-winning feast for the senses. Here, enjoy not only a tantalising culinary journey, but also views of the pool, valley, and, after dusk, the glow of hundreds of romantic candles.
offer_address: Br. Susut Desa Buahan, Payangan, Gianyar Bali 80362 Indonesia

title: Ubud Jungle Sanctuary with Yoga & Wellness Spa
description: Shut the world out from your private sanctuary at Blue Karma Dijiwa Ubud. Tucked away in the tranquil Ubud jungle, this magnetic hideaway beckons guests to indulge in the theraputic sounds of sprawling Balinese wildlife while blurring the lines between the outdoors and in. Rejuvinate your mind and body with a superfood meal at the Botanist Restaurant, where local produce are championed in nutrient-rich dishes, or immerse yourself in a full-body wellness treatment at Flying Bamboo Spa.
offer_address: Jalan Kelabang Moding, Banjar Bentuyung, Ubud, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Ubud Five-Star Pool Villa Luxury with Butler Service
description:
Escape to the lush, undulating hills of Ubud in search of your own private slice of Bali paradise at the five-star Kayumanis Ubud Private Villa & Spa, an urban sanctuary ranked among Tripadvisor’s top 10% of properties worldwide. This luxury retreat is home to just 23 elegantly appointed villas, each offering butler service and private pools.

Hidden within a tropical forest overlooking the Ayung River, and home to an intimate collection of one, two and three-bedroom villas, this heavenly retreat radiates tranquility, while only five minutes from the artists' village of Ubud. Unwind with a day of pampering at Kayumanis Spa Ubud or indulge in a romantic feast high over the river valley at Dining Corner. Take in Ubud's beauty with a guided tour, enrich your home recipes with onsite cooking classes or learn how to relax, meditate and harmonise your body through yoga (surcharges apply to activities).
offer_address: Jl. Raya Sayan Jl. Baung, Sayan, Kecamatan Ubud, Kabupaten Gianyar, Bali 80571, Indonesia

title: Elegant Five-Star Ubud Jungle Oasis near Sacred Monkey Forest
description: Escape to a five-star, evergreen wonderland close to Bali’s iconic Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary at the gorgeous Arkamara Dijiwa Ubud. Enjoy genuine hospitality, the harmony of a traditional Balinese village and pure tranquillity within the scenic surroundings and glistening outdoor pools of this retreat. Your days will be spent luxuriating at the onsite Kamalini Spa, treating your tastebuds to elegant Indonesian cuisine at Kaukau Restaurant or sipping a sundowner at Akasa Rooftop Bar.
offer_address: Jalan Katik Lantang, Singakerta, Ubud, Gianyar 80571, Bali, Indonesia

title: Boutique Ubud Jungle Retreat
description:
Find your jungle-fringed paradise at The Purist Villas and Spa, a boutique resort set among the rolling green hills of Ubud, Bali’s spiritual heart. Nestled amid lush gardens, the resort offers 18 unique, contemporary suites and villas to choose from, each one more stunning than the last. Enjoy peaceful seclusion tucked away behind rural roads, terraced rice fields and layers of jungle, while Ubud’s central hub is only a five-minute drive away, so you’re never too far from small-town convenience.

Spend blissful days by the pool (there are two to choose from), book in an indulgent spa treatment at the onsite Purist Spa, join a yoga class or dine alfresco on classic Indonesian cuisine at Café Balisimo. This is the perfect place to relax and recharge. Meanwhile, the serenity of Ubud, along with its cultural curiosities - galleries, local street markets and temples - is a breath of fresh air from the everyday.
offer_address: JL. Tirta Tawar, Banjar Kutuh Kaja 80571 Ubud, Bali, Indonesia
